title: Add GitHub stats auto-refresh
description: Periodically fetch GitHub stats (stars, last commit, open issues) for tools with github_url. Could use Supabase Edge Functions or a cron job.

title: Design federation protocol specification
description: Design the protocol for sharing tools and reviews between vibecheck instances. Should allow lightweight participation (no database required for followers).

title: Add Discord ingestion support
description: Add Discord export parser similar to Slack/WhatsApp ingesters.

title: Add full-text search with Postgres tsvector
description: Upgrade search from ILIKE to proper full-text search using Postgres tsvector for better results.

title: Add rate limiting to API
description: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse. Consider using slowapi or custom middleware.

title: Harvest tools from awesome-* lists
description: Script to pull tools from popular awesome lists on GitHub (awesome-llm, awesome-agents, etc) and import them with proper attribution.

title: Build basic web UI dashboard
description: Create a simple web interface for browsing tools, viewing evaluations, and submitting new tools. Start with read-only view.

title: Connect Supabase and test API endpoints
description: Wire up the Supabase client with real credentials and test all API endpoints work correctly.

title: Implement GitHub OAuth authentication
description: Add GitHub OAuth flow for user authentication. Required for write operations (evaluations, links, tool submissions).
